official_title: A bill to establish the Mineral King National Recreation Area, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to establish the Mineral King National Recreation Area in California. Requires a plan for the development of winter and summer recreational opportunities as well as the protection of scenic, scientific, and historic features in such area.

titles.title: A bill to establish the Mineral King National Recreation Area, and for other purposes.
